Detailed Description

Outputs the spike times individually.

This class has a protected constructor, and shall only be called by OutputterImpl.

Member Typedef Documentation

Member Function Documentation

unsigned IndivSpikeOutputter::nb_outputs_for_neuron ( NeuronInterface *  const  )  [inline]

Returns 1, not used here.

Used by a class NeuronListHandler (see OutputterImpl) to determine the number of outputs to pass to a FileWrapper.

template<class FileWrapper>
void IndivSpikeOutputter::operation ( const Time &  t_start,
const Time &  t_stop,
NeuronInterface *const   nrn,
FileWrapper *const   file_wrapper 
) [inline]

Performs the outputting of the individual spikes of a neuron.

Method template called according to the real type of FileWrapper.

Parameters:
t_start Start time. Anterior spike times are ignored.
t_stop Stop time. Posterior spike times are ignored.
nrn Neuron to treat.
file_wrapper (of type FileWrapper).
